footer.tagline: Building the future of coupon infrastructure through the Mezzofy Exchange Protocol.

hero.title: THE GLOBAL EXCHANGE FOR DIGITAL PROMOTIONS
hero.subtitle: Moving from Selling Software to Powering the World's Digital Commerce Infrastructure
hero.description: Mezzofy is the secure, tokenized protocol that connects coupon Supply (Merchants) directly to Demand (Distributors), ensuring fraudless validation and maximized redemption across the globe.

protocol.title: The Future of Promotions is Secure, Standardized, and Tokenized
protocol.description: Traditional digital promotions are failing due to fragmentation, high costs, and security risks. We eliminate the obsolete SaaS model and replace it with a high-liquidity, high-performance Exchange Protocol.

network.title: From Tool to Network
network.description: We focus on network effects and secure settlement, not just features. Build real value through connections.

ai.title: AI-Native Infrastructure
ai.description: Our data is machine-readable, making us the standard interface for the next generation of autonomous AI shopping agents.

security.title: Unrivaled Security
security.description: Every promotion is standardized into the Mezzofy Coupon Standard, a proprietary protocol that guarantees unique, fraud-proof digital assets.

ecosystem.title: From Vision to Products: The Mezzofy Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Our Exchange Protocol powers a complete suite of products designed to execute our infrastructure vision across the entire coupon lifecycle
ecosystem.diagram: [Visual Diagram: Product Ecosystem Layers showing the relationship between Core Infrastructure ‚Üí Distribution Channels ‚Üí Consumer Experience ‚Üí Strategy]

coreInfra.title: üèóÔ∏è Core Infrastructure
coreInfra.description: Foundation products for creating and exchanging coupons

retail.title: Retail Excellence
retail.description: For multi-location retailers with physical + digital presence

revenue.title: Revenue Maximizer
revenue.description: For merchants selling coupons as revenue stream

partner.title: Distribution Partner
partner.description: For loyalty programs, HR platforms, channel partners

enterprise.title: Enterprise Complete
enterprise.description: For large enterprises with complex needs

merchants.title: For Merchants: Turn Coupon Liabilities into High-Performing Digital Assets
merchants.description: Join the Exchange for free and gain instant access to global distribution channels. You only pay when a sale is successfully made and redeemed.

benefit1.title: Zero Upfront Cost
benefit1.description: Free Onboarding. Pay only a small transaction fee upon final, successful redemption (Performance-Based Model).

benefit2.title: Flexible Control
benefit2.description: Use our Bridge API with your existing CMS, or utilize our free Mezzofy CMS products. You dictate the rules, we handle the security.

benefit3.title: Global Footprint
benefit3.description: Instantly expose your inventory to our B2B marketplace, channel partners, and the high-volume NFC Network for physical retail engagement.

benefit4.title: Future-Proof Asset
benefit4.description: Your promotions are tokenized, opening up possibilities for secondary markets and new financial instruments (RWA Linkage).

distributors.title: For Distributors & Partners: Access the World's Most Secure, High-Intent Coupon Inventory
distributors.description: Enhance your loyalty program, banking app, or corporate HR portal with real-time, verified deals without the financial risk of inventory purchasing.

benefit1.title: Risk-Free Integration
benefit1.description: Free to Access and seamless integration via the Bridge API. Instantly pull standardized deals into your platform.

benefit2.title: Cash Flow Protection
benefit2.description: Our Consignment Settlement Model requires only a partial upfront deposit for Large Enterprises, with the bulk of the charge processed only on verified redemption.

benefit3.title: Standardized Quality
benefit3.description: All coupons adhere to the Mezzofy Coupon Standard, eliminating fraud risk and ensuring a perfect redemption experience for your customers.

benefit4.title: Targeted Distribution
benefit4.description: Consume inventory tailored for your channels: Loyalty & HR for internal benefits, and the AI Agent API for programmatic consumption.

tokenization.title: The Exchange Core: Where Commerce Meets Security
tokenization.description: Our Layer 2 Core transforms simple promotional codes into unique, trackable digital assets.

component1.title: Standardization & Tokenization
component1.description: Every voucher is tokenized upon ingestion, converting it into a secure, single-use digital asset (NFT/fungible instrument).

component2.title: Asset Linkage
component2.description: We create the foundation for linking these assets to Real-World Assets (RWA), expanding the digital coupon market into the rapidly growing Web3/DeFi asset space.

component3.title: Clearinghouse
component3.description: The core manages all consignment, financial reconciliation, and fraudless validation.

hero.title: ABOUT COMPANY
hero.subtitle: Connecting Businesses and Customers Through The Power of Smart Couponing

nameOrigin.title: Name Origin
nameOrigin.description: 'Mezzo' (Italian for 'medium') combined with '-fy' (meaning 'for you')‚Äîreflecting our dedication to linking enterprises with patrons through cutting-edge couponing solutions.

corePurpose.title: Core Purpose
corePurpose.description: Rather than simply developing digital coupons or applications, Mezzofy positions itself as a pioneer in COUPONS MARKETING infrastructure, making it easy to create, share, redeem, and measure.

keyObjectives.title: Key Objectives
keyObjectives.description: We aim to elevate spirits, forge meaningful connections, unleash creativity, and enable focus, making life more vibrant through the joy of sharing by facilitating interactions between merchants and consumers.

brands.title: Trusted by Leading Brands
brands.description: Mezzofy serves numerous multinational brands across retail, beauty, hospitality, finance, and entertainment sectors.

cta.title: Ready to power the future of commerce?
cta.description: Whether you are a merchant looking for maximum performance or a distributor seeking high-intent inventory, the Mezzofy Exchange Protocol is the indispensable infrastructure you need.

hero.title: CONTACT US
hero.subtitle: Reach out to the Mezzofy Team for all Business Inquiries and Strategic Collaboration Opportunities Globally

hero.title: INVESTORS

intro.label: INVESTOR
intro.title: Join Us in Revolutionizing Digital Commerce
intro.description: At Mezzofy, we are redefining how businesses engage customers through our innovative digital couponing solutions. As we continue to expand and innovate, we invite like-minded investors and partners to explore opportunities to collaborate with us. Together, let's revolutionize the way businesses connect with customers and unlock new growth possibilities.

cases.title: Learn from our success cases and latest insights
cases.description: Discover how Mezzofy is driving innovation in digital commerce and partnering with leading brands globally.

card1.title: Revolutionizing Retail with NFC-Enabled Digital Coupons
card1.description: Exploring how our NFC coupon technology is transforming in-store customer experiences for major retail chains.

card2.title: Mezzofy Expands Digital Coupon Platform to Southeast Asia
card2.description: Strategic partnership accelerates market expansion and brings innovative coupon solutions to new territories.

card3.title: Driving Customer Retention with Personalized Digital Rewards
card3.description: How a leading enterprise increased customer engagement by 45% using Mezzofy's intelligent coupon platform.

highlight1.title: Market Leadership
highlight1.description: As pioneers in the digital coupon infrastructure space, we've built the most comprehensive platform connecting merchants, distributors, and consumers globally.

highlight2.title: Proven Technology
highlight2.description: Our secure, scalable platform has processed millions of coupons worth billions in value, with industry-leading fraud prevention and real-time validation.

highlight3.title: Blue-Chip Partnerships
highlight3.description: Trusted by Fortune 500 companies and leading brands across retail, finance, hospitality, and entertainment sectors worldwide.

highlight4.title: Global Expansion
highlight4.description: Rapidly expanding into new markets with strong growth trajectory, innovative product pipeline, and clear path to market dominance.

hero.title: THE ULTIMATE COUPON PLAYBOOK
hero.subtitle: Smart Coupon Strategies for Every Stage of Growth
hero.description: Strategic framework aligning coupon tactics to customer lifecycle stages. Educational resource providing best practices for Attract, Spark, and Retain phases using the Mezzofy Exchange Protocol.

stage1.title: Attract Potential Customers
stage1.subtitle: Capture attention, spark interest, and bring new customers to your brand

flashSales.title: Flash Sales
flashSales.description: Create urgency with limited-time offers that drive immediate action and attract deal-seekers to your brand.

brandedCatalog.title: Branded Catalog
brandedCatalog.description: Showcase your products with curated coupon catalogs that highlight your brand identity and value proposition.

socialSharing.title: Social Sharing Coupon
socialSharing.description: Amplify your reach by incentivizing customers to share exclusive coupons with their networks on social media.

messenger.title: Coupon Via Messenger
messenger.description: Engage customers directly through messaging platforms with personalized coupon offers that feel exclusive and immediate.

stage2.title: Spark Interest & Drive Action
stage2.subtitle: Encourage discovery, build trust, and engage customers

survey.title: Survey Coupon
survey.description: Gather valuable customer insights while rewarding participation with coupons, creating a win-win engagement opportunity.

freeTrial.title: Free Trial Coupon
freeTrial.description: Lower the barrier to entry by offering risk-free trials that let customers experience your product or service firsthand.

wallet.title: Coupon Wallet
wallet.description: Build anticipation and repeat visits by allowing customers to save multiple coupons for future use in a centralized wallet.

chained.title: Chained Coupon
chained.description: Create progressive journeys where each coupon redemption unlocks the next, guiding customers through your product lineup.

stage3.title: Keep Customers Coming Back
stage3.subtitle: Build long-term relationships and turn customers into loyal advocates

luckyDraw.title: Lucky Draw Coupon
luckyDraw.description: Add excitement and gamification with random reward draws that keep customers engaged and eager to participate.

bundle.title: Bundle Discount Coupon
bundle.description: Increase average order value by offering attractive discounts on product bundles that complement each other.

occasion.title: Occasion Coupon
occasion.description: Strengthen emotional connections by celebrating birthdays, anniversaries, and special moments with personalized offers.

valueBoost.title: Value-Boost Coupon
valueBoost.description: Reward loyalty and encourage higher spending with tiered coupons that increase in value based on purchase amount or frequency.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: Seamless and flexible coupon creation & management - create in minutes, not hours

firstParty.title: First Party Data
firstParty.description: Real-time tracking & analytics for data-driven decisions that boost your ROI

openApi.title: Open API & Scalable
openApi.description: Easy integrations with your marketing stack. Scalable solutions tailored for businesses of all sizes

ecosystem.title: Works Seamlessly with the Mezzofy Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Coupon Playbook integrates with other Mezzofy products to create a complete solution

ecosystem.product2: Execute in-store activation strategies from playbook

benefits.title: Why Distributors Choose Mezzofy
benefits.description: The benefits that make the Mezzofy Exchange Protocol the trusted choice for coupon distribution

riskFree.title: Risk-Free Integration
riskFree.description: No upfront inventory investment. Access marketplace deals without purchasing or holding inventory. Pay only for what your users redeem.
riskFree.point2: No financial liability for unused deals

cashFlow.title: Cash Flow Protection
cashFlow.description: Transparent pricing models with predictable costs. Settlement terms designed for distributor cash flow optimization.
cashFlow.point3: No surprise fees or hidden costs

standardized.title: Standardized Quality
standardized.description: Every coupon on the marketplace meets strict quality standards. Verified merchants, clear terms, and fraud-proof tokenization ensure reliability.

targeted.title: Targeted Distribution
targeted.description: Filter and curate inventory to match your audience demographics, geographic markets, and strategic partnerships.
